textBeforeTable: By E-mail: If you have an equine health question that you are positive is not answered on the site, e-mail it to FarmCall@TheHorse.com for possible inclusion in the magazine. Please keep in mind that we cannot and will not diagnose any health problem or recommend treatment as we can't evaluate the horse. Only a veterinarian who has examined the horse can do that. Due to the volume of e-mails we receive, we can't answer all of them, but all suggestions for magazine articles will be considered. Do you have a question, comment or suggestion about The Horse? Contact us at the addresses below. Contact Us > Contact Us Home document.write(''); document.write('');
